apocalypse.host.game_selection.village.d: ~ Defend the Villager! Some zombies prioritise the Villager before players!
apocalypse.journal.miner_zombie.name: Miner
apocalypse.journal.miner_zombie.descript: The Miner can dig underground! You can't hit him while he's digging!
~ Cannot be hit while digging. Jumps out of the ground at you when close enough.

shop.xp_booster.success2: §abought an §eXP Booster! §bIt will be applied in the next game

game.revive1_1: §7<!> §eAll Players currently alive have §a6 second§b Immunity.

system.game_force_ready: §7[!]§a Host has forced everyone to be Ready!§r 
system.game_force_unready: §7[!]§c Host has forced everyone to be Unready§r 
system.game_cannot_change_readiness: §7[!]§c You cannot change your readiness status during a game!§r
system.game_cannot_change_readiness_forc: §7[!]§c You cannot change everyone's readiness status during a game!§r
system.game_cannot_change_game: §7[!]§c You cannot change selected gamemode during a game!§r
system.game_cannot_change_difficulty: §7[!]§c You cannot change the difficulty during a game!§r
system.game_cannot_change_difficulty_un: §7[!]§c You cannot change the difficulty when Ultra Nightmare is selected!§r
system.game_cannot_change_settings: §7[!]§c You cannot change game settings during a game!§r
system.dialogue_access: §7[!]§c You cannot access menus during a game!§r

system.game_not_enough_players: §l§cNot Enough Players For Game To Start!§e
system.point_capture_tip: §7<!> §eHaving trouble with some zombies? Read the §bJournal§e in your §bPersonal Menu§e for more info on each zombie type!
system.spectate_tip: §7<!> §eBored while waiting? Click on the §b"Spectate"§e block in the Lobby to §bwatch§e the on-going game!
system.stats_tip: §7<!> §eDid you know you can see how many §bzombies§e were §ckilled§e by clicking on the §b"Stats"§e block in the Lobby?
system.game.ready_reminder: §7<!>§e Remember to §aReady-up§e to join the next game by using the §bPersonal Menu§e item!
system.game.setmaxplayers_reminder: §7<!>§e Remember to do §a§o/setmaxplayers <number>§r§e to allow more players to join!
system.game_selection.apocalypse_descrip: §7>> §7Earn Points to get §bmore XP.§b All players who participated§7 will get XP rewards.
system.game_selection.endless_descriptio: §7>> §bNo XP rewards. §7Just survive as long as you can!
§7>> §7Zombies still drop their respective §bXP and loot.
system.game_selection.endless2_descripti: §7>> §bNo XP rewards. §7Just survive as long as you can!
§7>> §7Zombies still drop their respective §bXP and loot.
§7>> §bEndless II §7takes place in the §bPoint Capture Map!
system.game_selection.endless3_descripti: §7>> §bNo XP rewards. §7Just survive as long as you can!
§7>> §7Zombies still drop their respective §bXP and loot.
system.game_selection.endless4_descripti: §7>> §bNo XP rewards. §7Just survive as long as you can, with an §cUnkillable Johnny!
§7>> §7Zombies still drop their respective §bXP and loot.
system.game_selection.zombie_totem_descr: §7>> §7This time, there is a §cZombie Totem§7 that §bbuffs all zombies constantly. §7It §bcannot§7 be removed.
system.game_selection.ghost_description1: §7>> §bNo XP rewards. §7Just survive as long as you can!
system.game_selection.ghost_description2: §7>> §bOnly Zomboos & Buffers§7 spawn. Some §bNormal Zombies§7 may spawn for you to get ammo.
system.game_selection.nuketown_descripti: §7>> §bNo XP rewards. §7Just survive as long as you can!
§7>> §bOnly Exploders & Buffers§7 spawn. Some §bNormal Zombies§7 may spawn for you to get ammo.
system.game_selection.johnny_description: §7>> §bBoss Arena!§7 Kill §aJohnny§7 as fast as possible to§b earn more XP.
§7>> §7The longer you take, the §bless§7 XP you win.§b All players who participated§7 will get XP rewards.
§7>> §7If all players die, no rewards are given.
§7>> §7In this gamemode, you dont chainsaw the zombies. §cThey chainsaw you.
system.game_selection.point_capture_desc: §7>> §bZones§7 are marked by a §bCircle Particle. §7The more players in a zone, the §bfaster§7 you capture it
§7>> §7XP rewards§7 are only given when a zone is captured. If you §cdie,§7 you §bdo not§7 get the reward.
system.spectate.no_game: §7<!> §cThere is currently no game to spectate!
system.kills_stats.title: §7<!> §cAPOCALYPSE - §bWorld Kill Statistics §o§7[Chainsaw Kills Don't Count]
system.game_settings.20s: §7[!]§7 Waiting time between games is now §e20s!
system.game_settings.60s: §7[!]§7 Waiting time between games is now §e60s!
system.game_settings.120s: §7[!]§7 Waiting time between games is now §e120s!
system.game_hard_difficulty_required: §7[!]§c Hard Difficulty is required to play Ultra Nightmare!
gui.exp_tip: Use XP Levels to Buy Items!
apocalypse.gui.choose_weapon.title: §eWelcome to the Shop!§r
apocalypse.gui.viewweapon.title: §e<§bItem§e Selected>§r
apocalypse.stats.firerate.name: Firerate
apocalypse.stats.cost.name: Cost
apocalypse.stats.damage.name: Damage
apocalypse.stats.strengths.name: Strengths
apocalypse.stats.weaknesses.name: Weaknesses
apocalypse.main_menu.description: Welcome to the §cApocalypse§r §eShop§r! Select the Category you would like to visit or select §b"Exit"§f to leave this menu.
apocalypse.main_menu.weapons.name: Weapons
apocalypse.main_menu.weapons.description: Use your §eXP levels§7 to §eunlock new weapons!
apocalypse.main_menu.utility.name: Utility
apocalypse.main_menu.abilities.name: Abilities
apocalypse.main_menu.abilities.descripti: Get some §babilities§7 to support your §ezombie killing adventures!
apocalypse.main_menu.boosters.name: Boosters
apocalypse.main_menu.boosters.descriptio: Get some §bboosters§7 to aid you in slaying zombies!
apocalypse.weapon.oblivion.name: Oblivion
apocalypse.weapon.oblivion.description: The §oPerfect§r Oblivion shoots faster and does more damage the longer you shoot it. Perfect to decimate hordes of zombies.
apocalypse.weapon.hk417.name: HK-417
apocalypse.weapon.hk417.description: The HK-417 is a marksman rifle that packs a powerful punch with each shot. It's moderate fire rate proves useful in fending off zombies!
apocalypse.weapon.svd.name: SVD
apocalypse.weapon.svd.description: The SVD is a squad support weapon. Snipe down zombies before they even see you!
apocalypse.weapon.pistol.name: Serpent
apocalypse.weapon.pistol.description: The Serpent... pure §krickblock§r technology. It can reload without a magazine. It's destructive potential... is staggering.
apocalypse.weapon.plasma_cannon.name: Plasma Cannon
apocalypse.weapon.plasma_cannon.descript: The Plasma Cannon charges up as you shoot and glows red when fully charged. Punch to release the energy in a big shockwave, blasting nearby zombies.
apocalypse.weapon.flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
apocalypse.weapon.flamethrower.descripti: The Flamethrower does low impact damage but does considerable fire damage. Burning Zombies drop more ammo when killed.
apocalypse.weapon.fp6.name: FP6
apocalypse.weapon.fp6.description: The FP6 is a pump-action combat shotgun with massive firepower. Annihilate hordes of zombies with a single shot!
apocalypse.weapon.gapple.name: Golden Apple
apocalypse.weapon.gapple.description: Golden Apples are a nice treat during your zombie killstreak. They heal you as well as provide some absorption.
apocalypse.stats.gapple_cost.description: ~ §e3 Levels for 8 [16 Levels for x48 Bulk]§r
apocalypse.weapon.grenade.name: Frag Grenade
apocalypse.weapon.grenade.description: Frag Grenades help clear up the battlefield! Chuck one at a group of zombies!
apocalypse.stats.grenade_cost.descriptio: ~ §e5 Levels for 4 [18 Levels for x16 Bulk]§r
apocalypse.weapon.emergency_killer.name: Emergency Kill
apocalypse.weapon.emergency_killer.descr: Emergency Killers wipe out an area of zombies around you to help you in your time of need.
apocalypse.stats.emergency_killer_streng: ~ Affects all zombies in an 8 block radius with Wither 255 for 10s
apocalypse.stats.emergency_killer_weakne: ~ Affects user with Wither 255 for 2s. 60 second cooldown per item usage.
apocalypse.weapon.iron_set.name: Iron Set
apocalypse.weapon.iron_set.description: Suit up and protect yourself from those zombie hands (or weapons)
apocalypse.weapon.diamond_set.name: Diamond Set
apocalypse.weapon.diamond_set.descriptio: Want some extra protection? Block even more incoming damage with the Diamond Set!
~ Higher protection doesn't mean you're invincible
apocalypse.weapon.netherite_set.name: Netherite Set
apocalypse.weapon.netherite_set.descript: Special Unbreakable set with 40% Knockback Reduction (like Java Edition).
apocalypse.stats.netherite_set_weaknesse: ~ Well you're invincible. Or is it?
apocalypse.weapon.netherite_set2.name: Scarlet Set
apocalypse.weapon.netherite_set2.descrip: Special Unbreakable set with 100% Knockback Reduction
apocalypse.stats.netherite_set2_weakness: ~ Well you're even more invincible. Or is it?
apocalypse.weapon.hk417_ammo.name: HK-417 Ammo
apocalypse.weapon.svd_ammo.name: SVD Ammo
apocalypse.weapon.plasma_ammo.name: Plasma Ammo
apocalypse.weapon.flamethrower_ammo.name: Flamethrower
apocalypse.weapon.fp6_ammo.name: FP6 Ammo
apocalypse.weapon.oblivion_ammo.name: Oblivion Ammo
apocalypse.weapon.prestige.name: Prestige
apocalypse.weapon.prestige.description: Resets all progress but gives permanent buffs.
apocalypse.stats.prestige_cost.descripti: ~ §eUnlock All Weapons & Abilities. [Buy them from the Shop]
apocalypse.stats.prestige_strengths.desc: ~ +10 Max HP (Total 30 HP) and + Permanent Speed I
apocalypse.stats.prestige_weaknesses.des: ~ Resets all progress, but you start with the Presitge buffs
apocalypse.weapon.fire_resistance.name: Pyro
apocalypse.weapon.chainsaw.name: Chainsaw II
apocalypse.weapon.chainsaw.description: Allows you to Chainsaw Brutes. Chainsawing Brutes §cdoes not§r drop a Diamond but drops more ammo.
apocalypse.stats.chainsaw_strengths.desc: ~ You can literally instant kill brutes.
apocalypse.stats.chainsaw_weaknesses.des: ~ Chainsaw takes §l30 seconds longer§r§7 [Total 90s] to recharge after chainsawing a Brute
apocalypse.weapon.blood_fuelled.name: Blood Fuelled
apocalypse.weapon.blood_fuelled.descript: Gain a speed boost after chainsawing a zombie.
apocalypse.weapon.lifesteal.name: Lifesteal
apocalypse.weapon.lifesteal.description: Gain health after chainsawing a zombie
apocalypse.personal.main_menu.name: Personal Menu
apocalypse.personal.main_menu.descriptio: Welcome to the Personal Menu! Here you can view the Credits, ready-up for a game or view the Journal Entries!
apocalypse.personal.main_menu.stats.name: Credits
apocalypse.personal.main_menu.stats.desc: ~ Check out who helped with the making of this map!
apocalypse.personal.main_menu.journal_en: ~ View Enemy types and their stats!
apocalypse.personal.ready_up.name: Ready-Up
apocalypse.personal.ready_up.description: Set your readiness status as §a"Ready"§r to join the next game.
Set it to §c"Unready"§r to skip the next game.
apocalypse.host.force_ready.name: Force Ready-Up
apocalypse.host.force_ready.description: Set everyone's readiness status to §a"Ready"§r, for everyone to join the next game.
apocalypse.host.force_ready.description2: Set it to §c"Unready"§r for everyone to skip the next game.
apocalypse.personal.xp_booster.name: Experience
apocalypse.personal.xp_booster.descripti: Increases amount of XP dropped by zombies.
apocalypse.stats.xp_booster_strengths.de: ~ XP dropped by zombies is almost doubled.
apocalypse.stats.xp_booster_weaknesses.d: ~ One time use per game. Only 1 XP Booster can be active at any time.
apocalypse.stats.weakness_booster_cost.d: ~ §ex1 Lapis Block [Lapis Lazuli dropped by zombies]§r
apocalypse.stats.weakness_booster_streng: ~ Applies Weakness I to all zombies
apocalypse.stats.weakness_booster_weakne: ~ One time use per game. Only 1 Weakness Booster can be active at any time.
apocalypse.personal.pistol_booster.name: Pistol
apocalypse.personal.pistol_booster.descr: Buffs the P250 Pistol ridiculously for 4 minutes in 1 game.
apocalypse.stats.pistol_booster_cost.des: ~ §ex1 Netherite Ingot [Shield Zombies drop Golden Nuggets, Buffer zombies drop Netherite Scraps]§r
apocalypse.stats.pistol_booster_strength: ~ P250 does 50 damage per bullet when active.
apocalypse.stats.pistol_booster_weakness: ~ One time use per game. Only 1 Pistol Booster can be active at any time.
apocalypse.personal.revive_booster.name: Revive
apocalypse.personal.revive_booster.descr: Allows you to Revive all dead players in 1 game.
apocalypse.stats.revive_booster_strength: ~ Bring your friends back from the dead to fight the undead once again!
apocalypse.stats.revive_booster_weakness: ~ One time use per game. Only 1 person can have a Revive Booster in 1 game.
apocalypse.journal.normal_zombie.name: Normal Zombie
apocalypse.stats.normal_zombie_strengths: ~ Just a regular old zombie. Nothing strong about it, well except strength in numbers
apocalypse.journal.blinding_zombie.name: Blinder
apocalypse.journal.blinding_zombie.descr: Just like a regular zombie, but blinds whatever it hits!
apocalypse.journal.shield_zombie.name: Shield Zombie
apocalypse.journal.shield_zombie.descrip: Shield Zombies are quite tanky, they even give some resistance to nearby zombies!
apocalypse.stats.shield_zombie_strengths: ~ 25% Damage Reduction. Affects zombies in a 5 block radius with Resistance I
apocalypse.journal.crawling_zombie.name: Crawler
apocalypse.journal.crawling_zombie.descr: Crawling Zombies are 1 block tall and sneak up on you.
apocalypse.stats.crawling_zombie_strengt: ~ It's already cut in half, so you can't cut it in half again with a chainsaw.
apocalypse.journal.speedy_zombie.name: Speedy
apocalypse.journal.brute_zombie.name: Brute
apocalypse.journal.brute_zombie.descript: Big new zombie with devastating hits and massive health.
~ Big tank that can absorb a lot of damage. Drops a §bDiamond§7 when killed
apocalypse.stats.brute_zombie_weakness.d: ~ A little slow, also can be shot to death.
apocalypse.journal.friendship_zombie.des: Zombie who has learnt the ancient art of friendship! Wields a friendship pistol and harasses you from behind.
apocalypse.stats.friendship_zombie_weakn: ~ He can shoot you, but little does he know you can shoot at him too.
apocalypse.journal.exploding_zombie.name: Exploder
apocalypse.stats.exploding_zombie_weakne: ~ Damages other zombies with it's explosion
apocalypse.journal.charged_zombie.name: Buffer
apocalypse.journal.charged_zombie.descri: The Buffer Zombie is a dangerous zombie, don't kill it! It buffs all zombies when killed.
apocalypse.stats.charged_zombie_strength: ~ Applies Resistance I, Speed III, Strength II for 30s to all zombies when killed.
apocalypse.stats.charged_zombie_weakness: ~ Ability does not trigger when killed by grenades.
apocalypse.journal.lightning_zombie.name: Zappy
apocalypse.journal.lightning_zombie.desc: Slightly faster zombie with a ton of electrostatic energy within it.
apocalypse.stats.lightning_zombie_streng: ~ Strikes targetted player with lightning every 8-12s. Strikes up to 5 players when killed. Applies Speed II for 10s on all zombies upon death.
apocalypse.stats.lightning_zombie_weakne: ~ Ability does not trigger when killed by grenades or fire
apocalypse.journal.pirate_zombie.name: Pirate
apocalypse.journal.pirate_zombie.descrip: Arrr! me mighty hook can hook yer brains out!
apocalypse.stats.pirate_zombie_strengths: ~ Attacks apply Slowness I for 3 seconds. Fast movement speed
~ Just bring a gun to a knife fight
apocalypse.journal.poison_zombie.name: Viper
apocalypse.journal.poison_zombie.descrip: SSSSSlightly faster zombie with stinging attacks
apocalypse.stats.poison_zombie_strengths: ~ Attacks apply Poison I for 5 seconds. Slightly fast movement speed
~ just shoot them how many times must i tell you
apocalypse.journal.wither_zombie.name: Witherer
apocalypse.journal.wither_zombie.descrip: A gentlemen who kindly wants you dead
apocalypse.stats.wither_zombie_strengths: ~ Attacks apply Wither I for 5 seconds
apocalypse.journal.ghost_zombie.name: Zomboo
~ Invisible but briefly visible when attacking.
apocalypse.stats.ghost_zombie_weakness.d: ~ You can still shoot him when he's invisible
apocalypse.journal.putrid_zombie.name: Putrid
apocalypse.stats.putrid_zombie_strengths: ~ Attacks apply Nausea I for 8 seconds
apocalypse.journal.knight_zombie.name: Knight
apocalypse.journal.knight_zombie.descrip: Armoured Zombie armed with a Knight's Sword. Destroy its armour before you can kill it!
apocalypse.stats.knight_zombie_strengths: ~ Armour needs to be destroyed first. Takes 50% less damage from all sources.
~ Weak after it's armour is destroyed
apocalypse.stats.health.name: Health
apocalypse.host.main_menu.name: Host Menu
apocalypse.host.main_menu.description: Welcome to the Host Menu! Here you can select which game to play and change the difficulty.
apocalypse.host.main_menu2.name: Host Menu - 2
apocalypse.host.main_menu2.description: Welcome to the Host Menu - Part 2. Here you can change the game settings or force readiness.
apocalypse.host.main_menu2.game_settings: ~ Change the time interval between games.
apocalypse.host.main_menu2.force_ready.d: ~ Force all players to be ready or unready.
apocalypse.host.difficulty_selection.des: Select which difficulty you want to play on.
apocalypse.host.difficulty_selection.eas: §eIM TOO YOUNG TO DIE!!!§7 Zombies deal §aless damage§7 but still §aaren't§7 a force to be reckoned with.
apocalypse.host.difficulty_selection.nor: Challenging but §anot§7 too challenging. §aPerfectly balanced§7, as all things should be.
apocalypse.host.difficulty_selection.har: Want a §abigger challenge§7? Zombies deal §aextra damage.
apocalypse.host.game_selection.name: Game Selection
apocalypse.host.game_selection.descripti: Select which game you want to play.
apocalypse.host.game_selection2.name: Game Selection - 2
apocalypse.host.game_selection2.descript: Select which game you want to play.
apocalypse.host.game_selection3.name: Game Selection - 3
apocalypse.host.game_selection3.descript: Select which game you want to play.
apocalypse.host.game_selection4.name: Game Selection - 4
apocalypse.host.game_selection4.descript: Select which game you want to play.
apocalypse.host.game_selection5.name: Game Selection - 5
apocalypse.host.game_selection5.descript: Select which game you want to play.
apocalypse.host.game_selection6.name: Game Selection - 6
apocalypse.host.game_selection6.descript: Select which game you want to play.
apocalypse.host.game_selection.point_cap: ~ Locate and Capture 5 Different Zones to Win!
apocalypse.host.game_selection.apocalyps: ~ Survive Hordes of Zombies as long as possible!
apocalypse.host.game_selection.ultra_nig: ~ Survive MASSIVE Hordes of stronger zombies!
apocalypse.host.game_selection.ghost.des: ~ Survive as hordes of Zomboos haunt you!
apocalypse.host.game_selection.johnny.de: ~ Survive Johnny in an arena of zombies.
~ Survive as hordes of Exploders make you go aw man.
apocalypse.host.game_selection.endless.d: ~ Survive endless waves of zombies in the Johnny Map.
~ Survive endless waves of zombies in the Point Capture Map.
~ Survive endless waves of zombies in the Apocalypse Map.
~ Survive endless waves of zombies in the Johnny Map with an Unkillable Johnny.
apocalypse.host.game_selection.zombie_to: ~ Survive endless waves of zombies in the Johnny Map with an Zombie Totem that constantly buffs all zombies!
apocalypse.host.game_selection.none.name: §4[D]§f None
apocalypse.host.game_settings.name: Game Settings
apocalypse.host.game_settings.descriptio: Select the time interval between games. Note that timer will skip to 10s when more than 10 players are ready.
apocalypse.host.game_settings.20s.name: §e[20s]§b Quick Match
